headline: Ciena Surges 210% in 6 Months: Should Investors Buy, Hold or Fold?

headline: Rosenblatt Maintains Neutral on Arista Networks, Raises Price Target to $165
summary: Rosenblatt  analyst Mike Genovese   maintains Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) with a Neutral and raises the price target from $140 to $165.
